answers.answer: You are diagnosed with a psychiatric disability. And the diagnosis and the fact that you meet a listing may help you as regards benefits. I am diagnosed with schizoaffective disorder and have made a full recovery from that (read through my posts) but right now am impacted on by my physical disability which is secondary. But even before recovery I never saw my diagnosis as something shameful. Its the same as needing insulin for diabetes or anti-convulsants for epilepsy. Its not a pleasent thing but its part of your life. Hopefully with treatment you will improve.
